Header: Nepal and Sri Lanka step up economic cooperation
Content: Nepal and Sri Lanka have stepped up economic cooperation. A special summitwas held in Nepal by the Sri Lanka Chamber of Industries and Commerce under the patronage of Sri Lankan Ambassador in NepalSwarnaPerera and Nepal-Sri Lanka Industrial and Commerce Councilâ€™s Chairman Ramesh Maharjan. Representatives of the Association of Nepal Tourism Association and several other travel and commerce agencies in Nepal participated in the event. Discussions on the tourism industry were held at thesummit.
